name: Battle Academia
description:
Battle Academia is  set in a world where  five students go to school that cultivates the next generation of superheroes. Join Yuu to start his journey at Durandal Academy wanting to  make his dreams come true, becoming a hero.

Arrow Keys - Up, Down , Left , Right

ENTER - to interact / Open things

ESC - Open / Exit Menu etc.

SHIFT - Dash

This is the first game I've ever made. Sorry if it's not made very well or if it's very boring lol.  I'm still learning to make games, but i hoped you enjoyed this one, i had a lot of fun making it. This game is for free. You can make a small donation to support me if you want to. Thank you :)

I do NOT own any rights to "Battle Academia" and this is NOT an official game product. This game is a FANMADE based off the skin line from League of Legends 'Battle Academia' this game is not intended to make money. All donations are considered as a support of the game developer and not as an payment for the game.

- Yuu is my OC (Own Character) that  i've made up in the game, he's not  a actual Champion from League Of Legends (lol) I've always wanted to put one of my own OC in a game hehe.  Also that Yuu is my favorite one!

- The story in the game is not the same as the 'Battle Academia' lore I've just made up a storyline for the game.

- I did  not include Principle Yuumi, I didn't know how to make her in the same :(

-Please make sure to explore everything in the game, do not skip everything on every scene.

- This is just a short game, i don't think i'm going to make a full version of this. But if you want me to make more short RPG games like this just let me know!

If you already downloaded it and played it, thank you so much for playing it i'm sorry if it was too lame or if there poorly made parts in the game! This is my first time making it but i hoped you did enjoy playing it. Love you lots!

  

Yuu - A Kind, Shy and Adventurous person. Yuu is the new 1st year student of Durandal Academy.  Yuu is the Main Protagonist of the game.


Ezreal - A young orphan initially thought devoid of any superhuman abilities, Ezreal had resigned himself to a normal life once he graduated middle school. a 1st year at the prestigious Durandal Academy, where he's joined the ragtag Battle Club.


Jayce - A prestigious 2nd year whose face is known throughout the wider city of Durandal, Jayce is the class president, head of the world-renowned Luminary Club, and prodigious inventor of miraculous Jayce-branded technologies.

Lux - A 1st year at the Durandal Academy, Lux maintains an upbeat attitude no matter the odds. Despite her freshman position in the Sorcery Club.

Katarina - Katarina is a rough-edged loner who stays far away from the politics of Durandal Academy. A 2nd year student with a chip on her shoulder, she is also a top member of the Assassin Club.

Professor Graves - Graves is a salty ex-soldier who served in the Durandal military before he reluctantly became a professor. Following his discovery of something deep behind enemy lines, he received an offer to teach at the Academy from the God-Weapon itself.
